overview.title: SPL Shield Overview

overview.mission: To make Solana the safest blockchain for DeFi and NFTs through AI-driven protection and transparency.

core_components.name: AI Risk Scanner
core_components.description: An intelligent detection engine that assigns a real-time risk score (0–100) for each SPL token, detecting hidden mint authorities, unlocked liquidity, suspicious wallet activity, and MEV anomalies.

core_components.name: Analytics Dashboard
core_components.description: A visual layer offering risk analytics, token distribution, and liquidity health with AI-confidence scoring and developer verification.

core_components.name: Community Protection Tools
core_components.description: Telegram and Discord alert bots, scam reporting bounties, and DAO governance for collective protection.

ai_engine.description: SPL Shield’s neural AI analyzes on-chain liquidity, developer clustering, behavioral anomalies, and social sentiment to detect risk.
capabilities: Behavioral pattern recognition across Solana network

target_users.value: Instant scam detection and token trust scoring.
API and SDK integration for AI risk evaluation in wallets or launchpads.
Automated filtering of risky tokens before listing.
Real-time alerts and scam bounty incentives.

roadmap: SPL Shield v1 Launch + TDL Presale
Enterprise API and Revenue Sharing Model
